document.full_text: highlights of this year's festival include "the infernal comedy: confessions of a serial killer," starring mr. malkovich as the austrian criminal and author jack unterweger; and the last planned bam appearances by the merce cunningham dance company.
document.title: a murderous malkovich in lineup for bam's 2011 next wave festival
lines_and_colors: highlights of this year's festival include "the infernal comedy: confessions of a serial killer," starring mr. malkovich as the austrian criminal and author jack unterweger; and the last planned bam appearances by the merce cunningham dance company.
